text: Photo credit : Getty She explained, ` ` I ’ m a fun person and I ’ m all about women empowerment, I have my own businesses, and I really felt like they showed a lot of the other women with clothing lines and photo shoots and all this stuff and I ’ m like, ‘ Hold up girlfriend, Dominique has a whole bunch going on ’ — it may not be in the fashion world, but I have a lot going on, I wish they would have showed more of that.''
